title.rendered: Sturgeon Electric Leader: Subcontractors Help General Contractors Keep Pace with Industry Changes

content.rendered:
CONSTRUCTION TECHNOLOGY DIRECTOR GUESTS ON ART OF CONSTRUCTION PODCAST TO DISCUSS HOW EMBRACING TECHNOLOGICAL CAN BE KEY TO BUSINESS EVOLUTION

The Art of Construction, a Denver-based marketing, communication and sales firm dedicated to the building industry, recently featured Sturgeon Electric Director of Construction Technology Christopher Wilocki on a podcast entitled, “Why Subcontractors are Key to the General Contractor’s Success.”

As the ever-changing world of technology impacts our business, we must keep pace to better reach our goals and serve our partners and clients. Hear how Christopher works with estimators, project managers, field foremen, project controls specialists and BIM designers embrace technology and work closely with clients to plan, design, schedule and fabricate projects from inception to end.

Listen to the full podcast here.
